text: David Burrows (born 1977) is an Irish sailor. He competed at the 1996, 2000, 2004 and 2012 Summer Olympics.http://www.london2012.com/athlete/burrows- david-1063792/ His best Olympic result is a 9th place in the Finn class in Sydney in 2000. ==References== Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Irish male sailors (sport) Category:Olympic sailors of Ireland Category:Sailors at the 1996 Summer Olympics – Star Category:Sailors at the 2000 Summer Olympics – Finn Category:Sailors at the 2004 Summer Olympics – Finn Category:Sailors at the 2012 Summer Olympics – Star
title: David Burrows (sailor)
